trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for role-service settings.
trans-unit.target: 表示角色服務設定的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection> class enables you to programmatically access and modify the `roleService` element of the configuration section for using AJAX functionality in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection>類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`roleService`的使用中的 AJAX 功能的組態區段的項目[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The role service is typically used to retrieve role information for the user who is logged on by using an asynchronous Web service call.
trans-unit.target: 角色服務通常用來擷取角色資訊的使用者，使用非同步的 Web 服務呼叫登入。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection.Enabled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何以宣告方式指定值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection> element programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection>項目以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the role service is enabled for an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] application that uses AJAX features.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已為使用 AJAX 功能的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 應用程式啟用角色服務。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the role service is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用角色服務，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
